title: Forbes Megazine
body: Forbes magazine published data on the best small firms in $$2012$$. These were firms that had been publicly traded for at least a year, have a stock price of at least $5 per share, and have reported annual revenue between $5 million and $1 billion. The data below shows the ages of the corporate CEOs for a random sample of these firms.
lesson: 8.2 A Single Population Mean using the Student t Distribution
